00001 import math
00002 
00003 def exponential(ind, prob, params, random):
00004     for i in xrange(0, len(ind.genome)):
00005         if random.random() < prob:
00006             v = -math.log(random.random()) / params['lambda']
00007             if random.random() < 0.5:
00008                 v = -v
00009             ind.genome[i] += v
